title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From VM to Cloud: Tenable’s Approach to Cloud Vulnerability Management (HMC306)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从虚拟机到云：Tenable 的云漏洞管理方法 (HMC306)
abstract: As organizations adopt cloud infrastructure, a critical challenge emerges: how to be effective in managing vulnerabilities across disparate on-premises and cloud environments. This session introduces Tenable's new Cloud Vulnerability Management offering. We'll demonstrate several highly industry-relevant use cases for which Tenable Cloud VM provides comprehensive visibility and actionable insights. Through Tenable One, you can gain that same seamless visibility with other Tenable products as well. Join us to see how this Tenable offering can improve and make VM easier for your cloud workloads and with a consistent, single pane of glass. This presentation is brought to you by Tenable, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 随着组织采用云基础设施，出现了一个关键挑战：如何有效管理分散的本地和云环境中的漏洞。本次会议介绍了 Tenable 的新云漏洞管理产品。我们将演示几个与行业高度相关的用例，Tenable Cloud VM 为这些用例提供全面的可见性和可操作的洞察。通过 Tenable One，您也可以获得与其他 Tenable 产品相同的无缝可见性。加入我们，了解这一 Tenable 产品如何改进并简化您的云工作负载的漏洞管理，提供一致的单一管理界面。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Tenable 为您呈现。
